Package de.feu.massim22.group3.agents.utilsV2

Class StepUtilities

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.agents.utilsV2.StepUtilities
public class StepUtilities extends Object
The class StepUtilities contains all the methods that are necessary for the correct sequence of a single step .
Author:
Melinda Betz

  • Method Details

    • reportMapUpdate

      public static boolean reportMapUpdate(BdiAgentV2 agent, int step, int teamSize)
      The agent has initiated his map update.
      Parameters:
      agent - - the agent which has updated the map
      step - - the step in which the program is at the moment
      teamSize - - the size of the team of which the agent is part of
      Returns:
      the agent is done updating the map

      Parameters:
      agent - - the agent which has done the decisions
      step - - the step in which the program is at the moment
      teamSize - - the size of the team of which the agent is part of

    • doGroupProcessing

      public void doGroupProcessing(int step)
      All the things that have to be done to merge two groups together, update the maps for the resulting groups and do some group/supervisor decisions.
      Parameters:
      step - - the step in which the program is at the moment

    • mergeGroups

      public void mergeGroups(Supervisor supervisorGroup, Supervisor supervisorToMerge, BdiAgentV2 baseAgent, BdiAgentV2 agentFound, Point foundPosition)
      The method merges two groups together
      Parameters:
      supervisorGroup - - the supervisor of the group that the other group is going to be merged into
      supervisorToMerge - - the supervisor of the group that is going to be merged into the other group
      baseAgent - - the agent of the group that the other group is going to be merged into
      agentFound - - the agent of the group that is going to be merged into the other group
      foundPosition - - the position of the agent found
